alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 9:46PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Brief near blizzard conditions possible. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and drifting snow will impact north to south roads. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches that could cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The worst travel conditions from snow and blowing snow will be early tonight through Saturday afternoon. A flash freeze is expected tonight that will cause roads to become icy. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTION... Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this winter situation. If you must travel, take a winter emergency kit that includes blankets, a fully charged cell phone or cell phone charger, water, high energy snacks, a bag of sand or cat litter, a tow rope, a shovel, and a flashlight. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte; Western St. Joseph
